resources.string: Kolkata, also known as Calcutta is the capital of the Indian state of West Bengal. The city is widely regarded as the "cultural capital" of India, and is also nicknamed the "City of Joy".

1) The second largest city in India
 2) Football hub of India
 3) Has India’s largest cricket ground!
 4) Has world’s 2nd biggest football stadium!
 5) Famous for its sweet delight Rosogolla
 6) India’s oldest metro is here!
 7) Hand-Pulled rickshaws are still present!
 8) Hosts World’s 3rd Biggest Book Fair!
 9) You can find old rail tram here!
